data.actual_result: The menu does not hide but still placing the profile card or DM below the reactions menu making interaction with the window behind impossible.
data.expected_result: The Reactions menu is supposed to hide allowing you to see the profile card or DM window as every other navigation option does.
data.short_description: Right clicking a user from the reactions menu and selecting "Add Note" or "Message" does not hide menu, displaying the new/intended destination improperly.
data.steps_to_repro: - React to a message / find a message with one or more reactions on it - Click the three dots to the right of the message - Click "Reactions" - Right click on a user to bring up the User Options - Click "Add Note" or "Message" - Stand back and be amazed
